physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features an image of a bungalow. It is situated in the background of the photograph. There are trees in front and to the sides of the bungalow. There are groups of people standing in front of the bungalow.
sgcool_label_text:
This photograph is a long shot of a colonial bungalow with the family and servants posing before it.

With continuous improvement of camera technology, it became possible to take photographs outside a studio in the first decades of the 20th century. Many middle-class families collected photographs in albums as a way of documenting family life, or documentasi keluarga.
title_text: Photograph of a colonial bungalow with family and servants
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Families Household employees Bungalows Architecture, Colonial
